name: Press E To
description:
"Leo Burke has created a sad and wonderful little game trying to recreate actual feelings of mourning. " - Rock Paper Shotgun

"What Burke addresses in Press E To is Advanced Warfare's frigid approach to eliciting an emotional connection between a videogame character and a player. " - Kill Screen Daily

"Would you believe me if I said Press E To is actually kind of powerful" - Kotaku
